name: phonebook
description: For part 3, there may be issue with 3.10. While everything for part 3 may still be in here,  author will create new repo just for this part if there are any issue with heroku depolyment.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Fullstack_Open_2020/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
